019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
023import freemarker.core.ParseException;
024import freemarker.template.Configuration;
025import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
026import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
027import freemarker.template.SimpleNumber;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
030import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
031import freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModelEx;
032import freemarker.template.TemplateModelException;
033import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
034import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
035import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
036import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
037import java.io.IOException;
038import java.math.BigDecimal;
039import java.math.BigInteger;
040import java.net.URI;
041import java.net.URISyntaxException;
042import java.util.HashMap;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Convertions;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
049import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged.Type;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
052import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
053import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
054import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
055import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
056
057/**
058 * Adapts Kubenetes resources for instances of the Runner 
059 * application (the VMs) to changes in VM definitions (the CRs). 
060 * 
061 * In particular, the reconciler generates and updates:  
062 * 
063 * * A [`PVC`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes/)
064 *   for storage used by all VMs as a common repository for CDROM images.
065 * 
066 * * A [`ConfigMap`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/configmap/)
067 *   that defines the configuration file for the runner.
068 *    
069 * * A [`StatefulSet`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/statefulset/)
070 *   that creates 
071 *   * the [`Pod`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/) 
072 *     with the Runner instance, 
073 *   * a PVC for 1 MiB of persistent storage used by the Runner 
074 *     (referred to as the "runnerDataPvc") and
075 *   * the PVCs for the VM's disks.
076 *    
077 * * (Optional) A load balancer
078 *   [`Service`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/access-application-cluster/create-external-load-balancer/)
079 *   that allows the user to access a VM's console without knowing which
080 *   node it runs on.
081 * 
082 * The reconciler is part of the {@link Controller} component. It's 
083 * configuration properties are therefore defined in
084 * ```yaml
085 * "/Manager":
086 *   "/Controller":
087 *     "/Reconciler":
088 *       ...
089 * ```
090 *   
091 * The reconciler supports the following configuration properties:
092 * 
093 * * `runnerDataPvc.storageClassName`: The storage class name
094 *   to be used for the "runnerDataPvc" (the small volume used
095 *   by the runner for information such as the EFI variables). By
096 *   default, no `storageClassName` is generated, which causes
097 *   Kubernetes to use storage from the default storage class.
098 *   Define this if you want to use a specific storage class.
099 *
100 * * `cpuOvercommit`: The amount by which the current cpu count
101 *   from the VM definition is divided when generating the 
102 *   [`resources`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#resources)
103 *   properties for the VM (defaults to 2).
104 * 
105 * * `ramOvercommit`: The amount by which the current ram size
106 *   from the VM definition is divided when generating the
107 *   [`resources`](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#resources)
108 *   properties for the VM (defaults to 1.25).
109 *   
110 * * `loadBalancerService`: If defined, causes a load balancer service 
111 *   to be created. This property may be a boolean or
112 *   YAML that defines additional labels or annotations to be merged
113 *   into the service defintion. Here's an example for using
114 *   [MetalLb](https://metallb.universe.tf/) as "internal load balancer":
115 *   ```yaml 
116 *   loadBalancerService:
117 *     annotations:
118 *       metallb.universe.tf/loadBalancerIPs: 192.168.168.1
119 *       metallb.universe.tf/ip-allocated-from-pool: single-common
120 *       metallb.universe.tf/allow-shared-ip: single-common
121 *   ```
122 *   This makes all VM consoles available at IP address 192.168.168.1
123 *   with the port numbers from the VM definitions.
124 */
125@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
126    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
127public class Reconciler extends Component {
128
129    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SingularField")
130    private final Configuration fmConfig;
131    private final ConfigMapReconciler cmReconciler;
132    private final StatefulSetReconciler stsReconciler;
133    private final LoadBalancerReconciler lbReconciler;
134    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
135    private final Map<String, Object> config = new HashMap<>();
136
137    /**
138     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
139     *
140     * @param componentChannel the component channel
141     */
142    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
143        super(componentChannel);
144
145        // Configure freemarker library
146        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
147        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
148        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
149            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
150        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
151            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
152        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
153        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
154
155        cmReconciler = new ConfigMapReconciler(fmConfig);
156        stsReconciler = new StatefulSetReconciler(fmConfig);
157        lbReconciler = new LoadBalancerReconciler(fmConfig);
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Configures the component.
162     *
163     * @param event the event
164     */
165    @Handler
166    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
167        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(c -> {
168            config.putAll(c);
169        });
170    }
171
172    /**
173     * Handles the change event.
174     *
175     * @param event the event
176     * @param channel the channel
177     * @throws ApiException the api exception
178     * @throws IOException 
179     * @throws ParseException 
180     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
181     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
182     * @throws TemplateException 
183     * @throws KubectlException 
184     */
185    @Handler
186    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
187    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
188            throws ApiException, TemplateException, IOException {
189        // We're only interested in "spec" changes.
190        if (!event.specChanged()) {
191            return;
192        }
193
194        // Ownership relationships takes care of deletions
195        var defMeta = event.vmDefinition().getMetadata();
196        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
197            logger.fine(() -> "VM \"" + defMeta.getName() + "\" deleted");
198            return;
199        }
200
201        // Reconcile, use "augmented" vm definition for model
202        Map<String, Object> model = prepareModel(patchCr(event.vmDefinition()));
203        var configMap = cmReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
204        model.put("cm", configMap.getRaw());
205        stsReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
206        lbReconciler.reconcile(event, model, channel);
207    }
208
209    private DynamicKubernetesObject patchCr(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef) {
210        var json = vmDef.getRaw().deepCopy();
211        // Adjust cdromImage path
212        adjustCdRomPaths(json);
213
214        // Adjust cloud-init data
215        adjustCloudInitData(json);
216
217        return new DynamicKubernetesObject(json);
218    }
219
220    private void adjustCdRomPaths(JsonObject json) {
221        var disks
222            = GsonPtr.to(json).to("spec", "vm", "disks").get(JsonArray.class);
223        for (var disk : disks) {
224            var cdrom = (JsonObject) ((JsonObject) disk).get("cdrom");
225            if (cdrom == null) {
226                continue;
227            }
228            String image = cdrom.get("image").getAsString();
229            if (image.isEmpty()) {
230                continue;
231            }
232            try {
233                @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
234                var imageUri = new URI("file://" + Constants.IMAGE_REPO_PATH
235                    + "/").resolve(image);
236                if ("file".equals(imageUri.getScheme())) {
237                    cdrom.addProperty("image", imageUri.getPath());
238                } else {
239                    cdrom.addProperty("image", imageUri.toString());
240                }
241            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
242                logger.warning(() -> "Invalid CDROM image: " + image);
243            }
244        }
245    }
246
247    private void adjustCloudInitData(JsonObject json) {
248        var spec = GsonPtr.to(json).to("spec").get(JsonObject.class);
249        if (!spec.has("cloudInit")) {
250            return;
251        }
252        var metaData = GsonPtr.to(spec).to("cloudInit", "metaData");
253        if (metaData.getAsString("instance-id").isEmpty()) {
254            metaData.set("instance-id",
255                GsonPtr.to(json).getAsString("metadata", "resourceVersion")
256                    .map(s -> "v" + s).orElse("v1"));
257        }
258        if (metaData.getAsString("local-hostname").isEmpty()) {
259            metaData.set("local-hostname",
260                GsonPtr.to(json).getAsString("metadata", "name").get());
261        }
262    }
263
264    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CognitiveComplexity")
265    private Map<String, Object> prepareModel(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef)
266            throws TemplateModelException {
267        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
268        Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
269        model.put("managerVersion",
270            Optional.ofNullable(Reconciler.class.getPackage()
271                .getImplementationVersion()).orElse("(Unknown)"));
272        model.put("cr", vmDef.getRaw());
273        model.put("constants",
274            (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
275                Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
276                    .build().getStaticModels()
277                    .get(Constants.class.getName()));
278        model.put("reconciler", config);
279
280        // Methods
281        model.put("parseQuantity", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
282            @Override
283            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
284            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
285                    throws TemplateModelException {
286                var arg = arguments.get(0);
287                if (arg instanceof Number number) {
288                    return number;
289                }
290                try {
291                    return Quantity.fromString(arg.toString()).getNumber();
292                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
293                    throw new TemplateModelException("Cannot parse memory "
294                        + "specified as \"" + arg + "\": " + e.getMessage());
295                }
296            }
297        });
298        model.put("formatMemory", new TemplateMethodModelEx() {
299            @Override
300            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace")
301            public Object exec(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") List arguments)
302                    throws TemplateModelException {
303                var arg = arguments.get(0);
304                if (arg instanceof SimpleNumber number) {
305                    arg = number.getAsNumber();
306                }
307                BigInteger bigInt;
308                if (arg instanceof BigInteger value) {
309                    bigInt = value;
310                } else if (arg instanceof BigDecimal dec) {
311                    try {
312                        bigInt = dec.toBigIntegerExact();
313                    } catch (ArithmeticException e) {
314                        return arg;
315                    }
316                } else if (arg instanceof Integer value) {
317                    bigInt = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
318                } else if (arg instanceof Long value) {
319                    bigInt = BigInteger.valueOf(value);
320                } else {
321                    return arg;
322                }
323                return Convertions.formatMemory(bigInt);
324            }
325        });
326        return model;
327    }
328}
